thread.title: BRIEF-Marriott Files Preliminary Prospectus Supplement Related To A Potential Series X Notes Due 2028 Offering Of Up to $450 Million

title: BRIEF-Marriott Files Preliminary Prospectus Supplement Related To A Potential Series X Notes Due 2028 Offering Of Up to $450 Million
text:
Market News April 4, 2018 / 7:51 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Marriott Files Preliminary Prospectus Supplement Related To A Potential Series X Notes Due 2028 Offering Of Up to $450 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - Marriott International Inc: 
* MARRIOTT INTERNATIONAL FILES PRELIMINARY PROSPECTUS SUPPLEMENT RELATED TO A POTENTIAL SERIES X NOTES DUE 2028 OFFERING OF UPTO $450 MLN - SEC FILING Source text : [ bit.ly/2uPAMgu ] Further company coverage:
